mapper.select: SELECT BED.ID, BED.ROOMNUM as roomNum, BED.BEDSTATUS as bedStatus, BED.SORT, BED.DESCRIPTION, BEDANDCUST.CUSTID as customerId, BEDANDCUST.STARTTIME as startTime, BEDANDCUST.ENDTIME as endTime FROM BED,BEDANDCUST WHERE BED.ID=BEDANCUST.BEDID
SELECT BED.ID, BED.ROOMNUM as roomNum, BED.BEDSTATUS as bedStatus, BED.SORT, BED.DESCRIPTION, FROM BED WHERE BED.BEDSTATUS=1
SELECT BED.ID, BED.ROOMNUM as roomNum, BED.BEDSTATUS as bedStatus, BED.SORT, BED.DESCRIPTION, FROM BED WHERE BED.ID
SELECT ID, CUSTID as customerID, BEDID as bedId, STARTTIME as startTime, ENDTIME as endTime FROM BEDANDCUST WHERE BEDANDCUST.BEDID=#{bedId}
mapper.update: UPDATE BED SET ID=#{bed.id}, ROOMNUM=#{bed.roomNum}, BEDSTATUS=#{bed.bedStatus}, SORT=#{bed.sort}, DESCRIPTION=#{bed.description} WHERE ID=#{oldBedId}
